name: Tsunami Surfer - Surfing INC.
description:
Tsunami Surfer - About The Game

Welcome to Tsunami Surfer! Due to the rise of climate change there have been numerous tsunami's that have hit many popular cities. It's up to you to save the people who are drowning in the water, by bringing them to the safety docks but watch out for the dangerous objects and creatures who can damage your health! You only have a certain amount of time to save everyone, Good Luck!

Extras

Press ESC to Pause the game.

Attributions

Ocean background : https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/blue-water-surface-template-cartoon-style_14...
